byline.original: By MICHAEL FORSYTHE and ALAN WONG

lead_paragraph: People gathered to do what those across the border in mainland China could not: mark the bloody crackdown on pro-democracy protesters in Beijing.

headline.print_headline: Tiananmen Protest Marked in Hong Kong
headline.main: Thousands Rally in Hong Kong to Mark Tiananmen Anniversary

snippet: People gathered to do what those across the border in mainland China could not: mark the bloody crackdown on pro-democracy protesters in Beijing.
abstract: Tens of thousands gather in Hong Kong's Victoria Park to commemorate anniversary of violent 1989 crackdown on pro-democracy protesters in Beijing's Tiananmen Square by Chinese government.
